Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Oasis at Palm Cove in Palm Cove, you'll be by the ocean and minutes from Palm Cove Beach and close to Cairns Tropical Zoo. This 4-star apartment is within the vicinity of Clifton Beach and Half Moon Bay Golf Course.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 36 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies. Plasma televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and an outdoor tennis court. This Art Deco apartment also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and a hair salon. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, a computer station, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A train station pick-up service is provided at no charge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Oasis at Palm Cove in Palm Cove, you'll be by the ocean and minutes from Palm Cove Beach and close to Cairns Tropical Zoo. This 4-star apartment is within the vicinity of Clifton Beach and Half Moon Bay Golf Course.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Palm Cove Beach - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Cairns Tropical Zoo - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Clifton Beach - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Half Moon Bay Golf Course - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi
Yorkeys Knob Beach - 8.5 km / 5.3 mi
Kuranda Koala Gardens - 8.6 km / 5.3 mi
Tjapukai Cultural Park - 9.4 km / 5.8 mi
Skyrail Rainforest Cableway - 9.4 km / 5.8 mi
Cattana Wetlands - 9.6 km / 6 mi
Tjapukai Aboriginal Cultural Park - 11.3 km / 7 mi
Hartley's Crocodile Adventures - 11.7 km / 7.2 mi
Great Barrier Reef - 11.7 km / 7.3 mi
Barron Gorge National Park - 13.5 km / 8.4 mi
Skydive The Reef Cairns - 16.9 km / 10.5 mi
Mount Whitfield Conservation Park - 18.3 km / 11.3 mi

The preferred airport for Oasis at Palm Cove is Cairns, QLD (CNS-Cairns Intl.) - 16.8 km / 10.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
